REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2192 reute r f BC-INFO-DATA-TO-ACQUIRE 06-01 0073

TEXT.TITLE: INFO-DATA TO ACQUIRE USA OUTDOOR ADVERTISING
TEXT.BODY: <Info-Data Inc> said it will acquire <USA Outdoor Advertising Inc> of Jacksonville, Fla., in exchange for stock. USA Outdoor Advertising was acquired for 62.4 pct of the outstanding shares of Info-Data Inc, the company said. Info-Data said it plans to change its name to USA Outdoor Advertising Inc to reflect the change in the company's operations. Reuter
